ahri_dress.name: Ahri's Dress
ahri_dress.description: Ahri's signature white, red, and gold dress, complete with corset and accessories. The fabric is soft and supple, making it easy to wear and comfortable for long periods of time. Ahri's almost never seen without it, and it's by far her favorite.

ahri_dress2.name: Ahri's Dress2

froggius.name: FROGGIUS, THE LEGENDARY BLADE
froggius.description: THE MOST LEGENDARY BLADE THERE EVER DID BE

ironsword.name: Iron Sword
ironsword.description: An iron sword. Not spectacularly sharp, but not dull either.

woodbow.name: Wooden Bow
woodbow.description: Rootie tootie point and shooty. Good for attacking from afar.

ironbow.name: Iron Bow
ironbow.description: Whether or not iron makes for a better bow in general is up for debate. It certainly does in this case, though.
